resources.string-array:
What\'s your favorite way to spend time with your sibling?
What about your children reminds you of yourself?

How do you describe your boyfriend to other people?
What\'s something that has caused tension between you and your sibling?
What\'s the nicest thing you and your sibling have done for your parents?
Share something you\'ve kept from your sibling

Describe a time when you couldn\'t help your children even though you wanted to
Are you friends with any of your exes?
What was your favorite thing about your first date with your boyfriend?

What made you want to date your girlfriend?
Do you think you\'ll settle down and have kids someday?
